attributes.additional_details: Since the referendum  some members of parliament have used many devices both constitutional and non constitutional to frustrate the  decision to leave despite themselves having voted into law Article 50  which was supposed to pave the way for the UK to leave the EU without necessarily having a trade deal .Three years is long enough to have discussed our leaving .It is now time for UK to leave with no further frustrations from MPs.The peoples will to leave the EU must now be expressed
attributes.background: The result of the referendum on EU membership for the UK was held in 2016.The decision of the people of the United Kingdom was to leave the EU.
